title: Web-Based Educational Application Management: SCM-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course for Strengthening Graduate-Level Mathematics Education Application Development and Management Competencies. Practicum-focused structure using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can design a version control system for a web-based math education application using SCM (Source Code Management) tools
Learners can track change histories of educational content and system infrastructure and perform conflict resolution procedures
Learners can propose configuration management processes to address changes in educational requirements in deployment environments

resources: Educational WbEA (Web-Based Educational Application) sample project

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
